title: [Healer's House, Recovery Room]
description: A row of comfortable beds covered with pale blue linens line one wall, each with an oak chest at the foot.  The windows are hung with blue curtains that have been drawn back to allow light to enter the room.  Decorative glass plates painted with various designs in pastel colors hang upon the walls.  In one corner rests a cushioned rocking chair next to a small table, a closed book sitting upon it.

A row of comfortable beds covered with pale blue linens line one wall, each with an oak chest at the foot.  The windows are covered with blue curtains that have been closed to prevent any light entering from the outside.  Shaded lamps hang overhead, the flames in them turned down low.  In one corner rests a cushioned rocking chair next to a small table, a closed book sitting upon it.
